com.reportmill.text

Class RMXStringRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reportmill.text.RMXStringRun
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMTypes, RMTextTypes, java.lang.CharSequence, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RMXStringRun
extends java.lang.Object
implements RMTextTypes, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.CharSequence
    The Run class represents a range of characters in an xstring that share common attributes. This class makes a point to treat its attributes map as read-only so they can be shared among multiple runs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.reportmill.text.RMTextTypes

        RMTextTypes.TabType

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.reportmill.base.RMTypes

        RMTypes.Align, RMTypes.AlignX, RMTypes.AlignY
